command.interfaces

Interface ICommandTracker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandTracker

    public interface ICommandTracker
    An Interface expressing the concept of a command tracker which 'tracks' a collection of commands and allows them to be undone or redone.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean executeCommand(ICommand objACommand)
      Executes the provided command and if it completes adds it to the collection of executed commands being tracked
      java.lang.Boolean isRedoable()
      This method tests if a call to redoLastCommand will find a command that can be executed.
      java.lang.Boolean isUndoable()
      This method tests if a call to undoLastCommand will find a command that can be undone.
      java.lang.String redoLastCommand()
      This method executes the last command added to the collection of undone commands.
      java.lang.String undoLastCommand()
      This method reverses the last command added to the collection of executed commands.

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        java.lang.Boolean executeCommand(ICommand objACommand)
        Executes the provided command and if it completes adds it to the collection of executed commands being tracked
        Parameters:
        objACommand - - Interface to the command object to execute
        Returns:
        Boolean True if command completed and was added to the collection of executed commands, False otherwise.

      • undoLastCommand

        java.lang.String undoLastCommand()
        This method reverses the last command added to the collection of executed commands. Repeated calls to this method will provide an in order reversal of executed commands. Undone commands will be added to their own collection
        Returns:
        String - Explanation of what command was undone.

      • redoLastCommand

        java.lang.String redoLastCommand()
        This method executes the last command added to the collection of undone commands.
        Returns:
        String - Explanation of what command was redone.

      • isUndoable

        java.lang.Boolean isUndoable()
        This method tests if a call to undoLastCommand will find a command that can be undone.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if a executed command exists that can be undone, False otherwise.

      • isRedoable

        java.lang.Boolean isRedoable()
        This method tests if a call to redoLastCommand will find a command that can be executed.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if a undone command exists that can be executed, False otherwise.
